[[Game Show]] |runtime = 60 minutes |starring = [[Giselle Blondet]] |judges =[[Osmel Sousa]]
[[Lupita Jones]]
[[Julian Gil]] |country = [[United States]] |network = [[Univision]] |first_aired = February 29, 2008 |last_aired = May 23, 2008 |num_episodes = 13 |Previous_Winner = [[Alejandra Espinoza]] |winner_name = [[Melissa Marty]] |runner_name = Emeraude ToubÃ­a |- |preceded_by = ''[[Nuestra Belleza Latina 2007]]'' |followed_by = ''[[Nuestra Belleza Latina 2009]]'' |website = http://www.univision.com/content/channel.jhtml?chid=10&schid=10753 Nuestra Belleza Latina - Official Page }} '''''Nuestra Belleza Latina 2008''''' was the Second season of Nuestra Belleza Latina. The second season of [[Nuestra Belleza Latina]] (Our Latin Beauty) premiered on February 2008. Auditions were once again held in five major US cities (Los Angeles, California; Houston, Texas; Miami, Florida; Chicago, Illinois; and New York City, New York) and in San Juan, Puerto Rico. During the audition process, 75 young women were given passes to the semi-finals in Miami, Florida. The elimination process was quick, with 15 women leaving the first week, 40 on the second week, and finally, on March 28, 2008, 8 women were eliminated leaving the 12 finalists who will be moving into a Miami mansion were they will be living together for the rest of the competition. Each week, viewers will have a chance to vote for their favorite finalists. The three women with the least number of votes will then be in danger of being eliminated. However, two of the women in the bottom three will have the chance of being saved, one by her fellow finalists, and the other by the judges. [[Melissa Marty]], a contestant representing [[Puerto Rico]], won the competition. ==Changes== There were some major changes to this Season, two of the judging panel, [[Galavision|Carlos Calderon]] and [[Alicia Machado]] left the show. The replacement were, Beauty queen and Model [[Lupita Jones]] and Model/Actor [[Julian Gil]]. [[Osmel Sousa]] was still the main Judge, and was tougher when he chose the girls in the Auditions. [[Alejandra Espinoza]] became a correspondent in the show, she went backstage and had a one-on-one with the girls. The show was moved from Tuesday night to Fridays at 10pm/9c. ==Judges== *[[Osmel Sousa]] *[[Lupita Jones]] *[[Julian Gil]] ==Elimination chart==

Audition Place |- | Melissa Party | '''Puerto Rico''' |- | Natalia Rivera | '''Puerto Rico''' |- | Zoila Ceballos | '''New York''' |- | Dayanara Varela | '''New York''' |- | Manuela ArbelÃ¡ez | '''New York''' |- | Leana Astorga | '''Chicago''' |- | Janet Manzanarez | '''Chicago''' |} ===Season 2, Episode 3: Second Round in Miami=== Original Air Dateâ14 March 2008 The 75 selected girls go to Miami. They receive classes and hit the runway for the first time. The judges eliminate 15 of them. ===Season 2, Episode 4: Weather Prompter=== Original Air Dateâ21 March 2008 The third round of eliminations. The 60 remaining girs face a new challenge: they have to be the "weather girl". Just 20 of them make the cut. ===Season 2, Episode 5: Talent Showcase=== Original Air Dateâ28 March 2008 All the selected girls go to Miami. The judges evaluate them on stage and pick The 20 semi-finalists have a talent to show onstage, but only the 12 of them named as finalists have the change to perform in front of a live audience. At then end, the people at home gets to vote for the first time. '''The Final 12 are Chosen:''' {|class="wikitable" |- ! Contestant ! Country Representing |- | Melissa Marty | '''Puerto Rico''' |- | Emeraude ToubÃ­a | '''Mexico''' |- | Dayami Padron | '''Cuba''' |- | Zoila Ceballos | '''Republica Dominicana''' |- | Leticia Castro | '''Mexico''' |- | Manuela ArbelÃ¡ez | '''Colombia''' |- | Natalia Rivera | '''Puerto Rico''' |- | Genesis Seguias | '''Venezuela''' |- | Aideliz Hidalgo | '''Puerto Rico''' |- | Dayanira Varela | '''Mexico''' |- | Leana Astroga | '''Nicaragua''' |- | Jannet Manzanarez | '''Mexico''' |} ===Season 2, Episode 6: Extreme Runway=== Original Air Dateâ4 April 2008 The 12 finalists move to the "Mansion of the Beauty" where they start their physical training. They also have to face their first challenge: walk through a 10-inches-wide runway, wearing a tight dress, over a pool. At the end of the show, Jannete Manzanares is eliminated. ===Season 2, Episode 7: Mr. Frog's Soap Opera=== Original Air Dateâ11 April 2008 The 11 remaining girls have to face the challenge of the week: after receiving an acting class from a soap opera star, they play a princess role in a fairy tale scene, where towards the end they must kiss a frog. At the end of the show, Leana Astorga is eliminated. ===Season 2, Episode 8: Sabado gigante model=== Original Air Dateâ18 April 2008 The 10 remaining girls visit the studio of one of the longest running variety shows on television, "Sabado Gigante". Their challenge is to act as models, saying the lines of an imaginary cereal's ad. At the end of the show, Dayanira Varela is eliminated. ===Season 2, Episode 9: Underwater Photoshoot=== Original Air Dateâ25 April 2008 The 9 remaining finalists face the challenge of the week: Doing an underwater photo shoot with stars' photographer Raul Higuera, in the house pool, holding their breath. The winner gets to meet Colombian singer Juanes at one of his concerts. At the end of the show, Aideliz Hidalgo is eliminated. ===Season 2, Episode 10: Shampoo Audition=== Original Air Dateâ2 May 2008 The 8 remaining finalists receive the visit of singer-songwriter Jeremias at the house. The challenge of the week is an audition for a shampoo TV ad in front of real clients. Genesis Seguias, the winner, receives $10,000 in cash but, at the end of the show, she is eliminated based on the audience votes. ===Season 2, Episode 11: Memory Game=== Original Air Dateâ9 May 2008 The 7 remaining girls go to a department store where they take a look at a mannequin for 10 seconds and have to mimic its clothes in less than 10 minutes. Later, live on the show, they have to model their outfits with style. Melissa Marty is the winner of the $10,000 cash prize. At the end of the show, Natalia Rivera is eliminated. ===Season 2, Episode 12: The Big Finale 2008=== Original Air Dateâ16 May 2008 The results show. For the second year, the people have voted for their favorite. The 6 remaining contestants receive a final evaluation by the judges before they get to know their position. At the end of the show, Melissa Marty is crowned as "Nuestra Belleza Latina 2008". '''Winner:'''[[Melissa Marty]] ===Season 2, Episode 13: El destape 2008=== Original Air Dateâ25 May 2008 The best of this year's series. 11 | Leana|| Manuela||bgcolor="EE82EE"| Leana || style="background:#CCCCCC;" colspan="11" | |- ! 12 | Janet ||bgcolor="EE82EE"| Janet|| style="background:#CCCCCC;" colspan="10" | |} :{{colorbox|Lightsteelblue}} The contestant won the challenge of the week :{{colorbox|violet}} The contestant was eliminated :{{colorbox|Purple}} The contestant won the challenge of the week, but was eliminated :{{colorbox|Lightpink}} The contestant became the runner-up :{{colorbox|Limegreen}} The contestant won the competition ===Contestants notes=== *{{flagicon|Puerto Rico}} [[Melissa Marty]] competed in [[Miss Puerto Rico Universe 2008]] where she landed a position in the Top 13. *{{flagicon|Puerto Rico}} [[Aideliz Hidalgo]] competed in [[Miss Universe Puerto Rico 2010]], where she placed as 2nd Runner-up. She former Miss Puerto Rico International 2010 and semifinalist in [[Miss International 2010]]. *{{flagicon|Puerto Rico}} [[Natalia Rivera]] competed in Miss Puerto Rico Teen 2006, where she won the title. *{{flagicon|Mexico}} [[Nuestra Belleza Mexico 2006|Dayanira Varela]] competed in [[Nuestra Belleza MÃ©xico 2006]] representing Zacatecas. *{{flagicon|Dominican Republic}} Zoila Ceballos competed in Protagonistas First Season but was voted off in top 36. ==External links== * [http://www.univision.com/content/channel.jhtml?chid=10&schid=10753 Nuestra Belleza Latina - Official Page] {{es icon}} ==References== * [http://www.univision.com/content/channel.jhtml?chid=10&schid=10753 Nuestra Belleza Latina at Univision.com] {{es icon}} *{{imdb title|1043861|Nuestra Belleza Latina}} *[http://www.univision.com/content/channel.jhtml?chid=9486&schid=9487&secid=16181] *[www.hispanictips.com/.../univision-announces-finalists-nuestra-belleza-latina- competition/] ==Winners== {{start box}} {{succession box|title=''Nuestra Belleza Latina 2008''|before=[[Alejandra Espinoza]]|after=[[Greydis Gil]]|-[[Nuestra Belleza Latina 2009]]|years='''[[Melissa Marty]]'''}} {{end box}} [[Category:Univision network shows]] [[es:Nuestra belleza latina]] {{Nuestra Belleza Latina}} {{Contestants of Nuestra Belleza Latina}}
